snippet.title: Echoed Memories (GMEM2) GAMEPLAY Trailer
snippet.description:
Echoed Memories: Gaia's Melody II
Gameplay Trailer
*video contains mild spoilers because I mean it's a trailer of course it does

Still no confirmed release date. You can check echoedgames.com for more details, but there was a death in my family and its aftermath sort of severely disrupted the day to day lives of me and my usual debuggers. There's been a lot going on, so debugging has taken a lot longer than I was expecting.
But: The game is done (save M7Theater 2, which is kind if my safety net so I'm holding back doing it until I can't anymore... which is basically now O_O), the trailers are done,  the guidebook is done, the opening is done, and... was that everything?

Just fixing bugs now. If I can get a more concrete schedule for at least 2 debuggers than I can actually figure out a release date.

Music:
Hope is here - melodyloops.com
Reunion Full - Tandess/Trial & Error
Sunflower OFV - Tandess/Trial & Error
Other music: jewelbeat.com




GMEM1 download here: http://store.steampowered.com/app/725410/Gaias_Melody_Echoed_Melodies/
or on itch.io:
https://echoedgames.itch.io/gaiasmelodyechoedmelodies

Here for info:
http://echoedgames.com/


If you need me, I check here:
http://twitter.com/echo607
@echo607
#echoedmemories #gaiasmelody #gamedev #rpgmaker #indiedev #rpggame #rmmv #steam
